In that moment, Ron’s loyalty shone—reminding Harry that even the strongest need friends.
- After two years as an Auror, Ron left to support George at Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes. Amidst laughter and chaos, Ron’s true strength was in rebuilding hope, helping craft a new future for the wizarding world alongside those he loved.

ron_weasley:
character_response: Well, I reckon I've made my fair share of friends over the years, though not always as regularly as you might think.
